data.title: Steve Case
data.text:
AKA Stephen McConnell Case

Born: 21-Aug-1958

Birthplace: Honolulu, HI

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Business

Party Affiliation: Republican

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: CEO of AOL, 1991-2001

Father: (lawyer)

Mother: (elementary school teacher)

Brother: Daniel H. Case III (Hambrecht & Quist, d. 2002 brain cancer)

Wife: Joanne Baker (three children, m. 1985, div.)

Wife: Jeane Villanueva (had adulterous affair with her, causing divorce with Baker)

High School: Punahou School (1976)

University: BA Political Science, Williams College (1980)

AOL CEO (1991-2001)

AOL EVP (1987-91)

AOL VP Marketing (1985-87)

Procter & Gamble Sales

Member of the Board of AOL (as Chairman, 1995-2001)

Member of the Board of AOL Time Warner (as Chairman, 2001-03)

Member of the Board of Time Warner (as Chairman, 2003, as Director, 2003-05)

Academy of Achievement (1999)

Alfalfa Club 2000

Bush-Cheney '04

Case Foundation

Forward Together PAC

Friends of George Allen

George W. Bush for President

Keep Our Mission PAC

McCain 2000

World Technology Network

Woodrow Wilson Award for Corporate Citizenship (with Mrs. Jean Case)

Funeral: Katharine Graham (2001)

The Digerati

Is the subject of books:

Fools Rush In: Steve Case, Jerry Levin, and the Fall of AOL Time Warner, 2004, BY: Nina Munk

New!

Requires Flash 7+ and Javascript.
